chapters.title: Chapter 17: Secrets
chapters.info: Althyn Conly, p. 433 (523)—Novice recruited in the Tower in exile. She is a friend of Bodewhin Cauthon, and like Bode has the ability with Earth necessary to make cuendillar. She and Bode decided to try making two items at once, just to see what would happen; the two objects fused together into one sold lump—half iron, half cuendillar.
